title: LeBron James erases Courtney Lee off Planet Earth with picture-perfect chase-down block
text:
LeBron James erases Courtney Lee off Planet Earth with picture-perfect chase-down block Getty Images Feb 23, 2017 at 11:00p ET 0Shares 
Listen, Courtney Lee, the game is over. Please donâ€™t do anything that might get you killed, like challenging LeBron James at the rim OH MY GOOD GOD! That was filthy ðŸ˜³ðŸ‘‘ pic.twitter.com/Q92l0xhLrr 
â€” Bleacher Report (@BleacherReport) February 24, 2017 
On Thursday, the Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the New York Knicks 119-104, and while the game certainly felt like it was a lot more lopsided than the final score, it wasnâ€™t truly over until LeBron executed one of his patented chase-down blocks and pinned Courtney Lee plus his entire family on the glass. 
â€” NBA on TNT (@NBAonTNT) February 24, 2017 
His name is no longer Courtney Lee, itâ€™s just Courtney L. 
In addition to this brutal, soul-harvesting emasculation of Lee, LeBron finished with a cool 18 points (7-11 FG), 13 rebounds, 15 assists and 3 blocks. Just another night at the office for the worldâ€™s best basketball player.
